title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 497.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 497.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This section establishes the requirement for residence of
members of the permanent staff (other than stenographic or clerical) of the
district offices, made necessary by their responsibilities preparatory to, during and subsequent to a natural disaster or civil defense
emergency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
497.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
